simple.escp

Class SimpleEscp

  • java.lang.Object
    • simple.escp.SimpleEscp

  • public class SimpleEscp
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides methods to access simple-escp services. You should create a new SimpleEscp for every instance of PrintService.

    For example, to print string from default printer, use the following code: 

         SimpleEscp simpleEscp = new SimpleEscp();
     simpleEscp.print("This is the first line\nThis is the second line\n\f");

    To print based on JSON template, use the following code: 

         Template template = new JsonTemplate(...);
     Map data = new HashMap();
     data.put("name", "Solid Snake");
     SimpleEscp simpleEscp = new SimpleEscp();
     simpleEscp.print(template, data);

      • print

        public javax.print.DocPrintJob print(java.lang.String text)
        Print a string to current printer. This is a low level service provides by simple-escp for direct string printing.
        Parameters:
        text - the string to print. This string may contains ESC/P code.
        Returns:
        a DocPrintJob that is associated with this operation.

      • print

        public javax.print.DocPrintJob print(Template template,
                            java.util.Map mapSource,
                            java.lang.Object objectSource)
        Fill a template based on value and print it to current printer.
        Parameters:
        template - an instance of Template.
        mapSource - contains values that will replace placeholders in template. This value has the highest priority.
        objectSource - contains value that will replace placeholders in template.
        Returns:
        a DocPrintJob that is associated with this operation.
